title: VegAmo MX
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Take-out, Bakery, Fusion
description: An all-vegan bakery, coffee shop and store. The coffee shop menu includes smoothies, salads, ciabattas, waffles, tamales and cakes like a raw vegan cheesecake made of cashews and coconut rasps with blackberry sauce; lemon and spirulina pie; chocolate chunk cookies; raw sugar free brownies, truffles, and more. The store carries a variety of vegan artisanal Mexican products such as milk (rice, soy, coconut, almond), cheese, meat, jam, butters (almond, peanut, macadamia, cashew), vegan nutella, yogurt, superfoods (chia, spirulina, hemp) and more.
